e="preserve">Marcel Rigout (10 May 1928 – 23 August 2014) was a French politician. He served as the Minister of Vocational Training from 1981 to 1984, under former President François Mitterrand. He was a member of the French Communist Party (PCF;).
Rigout was born in Verneuil-sur-Vienne. He wrote the novel "L'autre chance" in 1983.
Rigout died on 23 August 2014 in Limoges, aged 86.
